data.title: Nice place for lunch by the water
data.text: Good service, friendly wait staff. Had patty melt with some really good onion rings. They have a nice outdoor seating area on the water. Great place for lunch or having a beer by the water.

data.title: Nice view.......
data.text: Not impressed probably won't be back. Went for lunch...service was good, waitress was friendly. Onion rings....greasy and small plate for price (7 rings).  Had the turkey rueben....lacking flavor...not sure if there was dressing on it and sauerkraut was minimal. Husband had the tuna sandwich....thin thin piece of tuna but was okay flavor wise.  Place is ok if you want bar food with a beach feel (eating inside but furniture is dirty and weathered as if outside)

data.title: Mom
data.text: Had a Great lunch. Good food Great atmosphere. Views is beautiful.  Servers really sweet and good service

data.title: Love this place!
data.text: My husband and I actually been here several times. A few times by ourselves and a few times with family and friends. We love going to local businesses and this place meets our expectations every time! They have an outside eating area on the marina that beautiful at sunset. The crab dip served is delicious as well as the fried shrimp and veggies. I can't remember what my husband had but he loved his meal as well. We'll be going there as long as we live here!

data.title: Local seafood restaurant in need of a clean up
data.text: Took my family here last night for supper.  We arrived early so seating wasn't a problem.  Our server was nice and efficient. We all ordered and I ordered the Blackened Rib Eye.  I asked that my grilled/mixed veggies be cooked longer and blackened.  The steak did arrive on a hot and sizzling plate as advertised.  But I ordered medium and this was well done.  My son ordered the fried fish and it was so underdone it had to go back.  I kept my steak rather than waiting for another.  Besides being overcooked it was not in the least bit Blackened as advertised.  Someone at this restaurant needs to learn what Blackened really is.  My veggies were not cooked well as I requested either.  Steak was thin and while it tasted ok it was far from being a good steak.  The wife ordered crab legs and for the market price of $35.99 she thought they would have been better.  We had our grandson with us so a visit to the game room was in order.  What a filthy floor.  I'm not sure they've cleaned this floor in like forever.It just made my opinion of the entire restaurant go down seeing this.  By far nowhere near the worst meal I've ever had but for the money I spent for us I left a little disappointed.

data.title: A diamond in the ruff
data.text: Do not let the outside fool you! The view on the water out back is fantastic as is the food. We had the shrimp platter, Oyster platter, and the nachos. The sanitation rating was 96% and the waitress Chelsey was great.

data.title: Wow!!!
data.text: I had the fried oysters.  Wow!  To die for. I went when they had a karaoke night.  Great atmosphere. The staff, very kind and professional. They have other things like Poole, darts, and I recall some video games. A must try. They have more than seafood. My friends had a monster salad. Looked and they stated it was delicious.

data.title: Great food and nice atmosphere! Friendly owner and pretty parrot, sitting on a river! Don't judge by the looks!
data.text: Great restaurant and great food! Friendly owner and pretty parrot. Nice atmosphere!👍Don't  the restaurant by the outside!

data.title: Early dinner
data.text: Very quiet spot for the time of day we went.  Very sweet waitress who kept the beer and tea coming.  My son had oysters, I tried them and liked them even though I thought I wouldn't.  I had a seafood mix that was wonderful.  After dinner we went out in their back deck and sat in the rocking chairs, visited, watched the water and talked to the parrot.  It was a great experience.

data.title: Many Times
data.text: This is the place to go relax, have a great meal and cold drink.  This is one of my favorite restaurants, especially for lunch.  Bob Beck, the owner, is very friendly, just do not get to close to Jo-Jo (the parrot).  Although very entertaining, not very friendly.  If you have never taken his boat ride, you are in for a treat.  Great way to enjoy a birthday, family fun event, or anything else.  Whenever I have a guest from out of town, this is where I bring them.

data.title: Nice people.  Hometown feel.
data.text:
Simple American fare.  Excellent outdoor dining facilities.  Excellent beer collection.  Great service.

Caution that this has sort of a down home bar and grill feel.  It is family friendly, but "fine dining": it isn't.

data.title: Tasty light meal, pleasant service!
data.text: We stopped after a positive review on TripAdvisor for a place to eat directly on our route.  We were not disappointed.  The atmosphere is shabby bar, but the food was quite good.  My wife ordered a Breaded Shrimp Salad and I had a Fried Flounder Sandwich.  Both were tasty and reasonably priced.

data.title: Not very good
data.text: Food was horrible place was dirty. It's a dive river trash bar . They have a partot. Owner was rude . Food was a little expensive for how bad it turned out yuck.bathroom was gross too parking lots is in bad shape . Great location too bad it's a huge dump.

data.title: Great Dive Bar!
data.text: Not the prettiest place I have ever been but really good food, really good vibe, and a great staff.  Fact is its old looking but in a good way.  We only had one bad experience but I think the young lady was new and she tried her best.  Recommend the patty melt!!!!!

data.title: Evening at the Marina
data.text: The place is pretty big and they have indoor and outside seating. Service was very good and the food was served in a timely manner.  I ordered a flounder sandwich which was very good, but I thought was a little on the small side for the price. My girl friend had a BLT, she said was very good, but again on the small side for the price.

data.title: Second visit.
data.text: We were here a year ago and had to come back when we returned to Jacksonville.   The food was just as good as it was a year ago.  The shirmp and the hush puppies  are so good. The fried oysters we another big hit at our table. Give it a try you won't be disappointed.

data.title: Great food and atmosphere
data.text: Be sure to visit jo-jack the parrot on the outside deck. Great food, great joint. Doesn't look like much from the outside but very cool place.

data.title: Decent
data.text: Went there tonight with our friends and it was okay. The staff was friendly and the food was decent. Nothing to write home about.

data.title: Right on the marina.  Lots of outdoor dining
data.text: Food and drinks were reasonably priced.  Crab dip appetizer was excellent.  I had shrimp platter.  Lightly breaded but smaller type, Cole slaw and hush puppies were good.  Wife had mahi mahi which she liked.  Serve all types of food.

data.title: Summer at the marina
data.text: We put our boat in all year here and regular menu is great but in summer there's pig pickin on Sunday that can't be beat. Free pig you buy drinks and sides.
